description: Asserts that the model can make a sequence of function calls in the correct order and conveys the results to the user
prompt: Call funcA with 1, then call funcB with 2, then respond with the results of both calls

expected_function_calls.name: funcA
expected_function_calls.result: This is the output of funcA(1)

expected_function_calls.name: funcB
expected_function_calls.result: This is the output of funcB(2)

final_answer_should: The answer should indicate that the result of calling funcA with 1 is "This is the output of funcA(1)" and that the result of calling funcB with 2 is "This is the output of funcB(2)"
